extension.name: PLG_MYARTICLES_TITLE
extension.author: JomSocial Team
extension.copyright: Copyright 2008 - 2013 by iJoomla, Inc. - All rights reserved.

param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appear in the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Default position if you select this as core apps

param.name: section
param.label: Category
param.description: Show only category listed in this textfield (seperated by comma eg. 1,2,3). Leave it blank to display all articles.

param.name: limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Limit the length of the content (default is 50).

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of comment to display (default is 10)

param.name: introtext
param.label: Introtext
param.description: Select whether to display the introtext of the article.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

param.name: display_expired
param.label: Display Expired
param.description: Display expired articles based on the publish up / publish down date.
